required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: MRI-based Clinico-radiomics Predicting Lymph Node Metastasis Status of Hilar Cholangiocarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a MRI-based Clinico-radiomics Model in Predicting Lymph Node Metastasis Status of Hilar Cholangiocarcinoma Patients: a Prospective Diagnostic Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, observational diagnostic study aiming to assess multiparametric MRI-based clinico-radiomics for identifying lymph node metastasis status in hilar cholangiocarcinoma.

detailed_description.textblock: A preoperative tool capable of predicting lymph node metastasis status in hilar cholangiocarcinoma is lacking and urgently needed for clinical practice. This study proposes to establish and evaluate a machine-learning algorithms of multiparametric MRI-based clinico-radiomics for identifying lymph node metastasis status in hilar cholangiocarcinoma. This study will investigate the relationship between radiomic depth information and tumor biological characteristics. The study includes the construction of capable MRI-based clinico-radiomics prediction model and the validation of the prediction model.

primary_outcome.description: The value of multiparametric MRI-based clinico-radiomics in predicting lymph node metastasis.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University
arm_group.description: The cohort of Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University is the validation cohort.

intervention.description: As this is a observational study, there are no interventions.
intervention.arm_group_label: Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hospital of Sun Yat-sen University

study_pop.textblock: Patients who had resectable hilar cholangiocarcinoma and completed the upper abdomen MRI examination before surgery.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Biliary and Pancreatic Surgery, Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University

facility.name: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University
